results.name: Number of partitions of n into exactly seven nonzero decimal palindromes.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: p:= proc(n) option remember; local i, s; s:= ""||n;
for i to iquo(length(s), 2) do if
s[i]<>s[-i] then return false fi od; true
b:= proc(n, i, t) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(t*i<n,
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 19 2018
